roleset.name: to bring or come into contact
roleset.note: CONTACT-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry contact.01, OntoNotes grouping contact-n senses 1& 3; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from contact.01-n)

example.name: passive
example.text: He says Campbell-1 was n't even contacted [*-1] by the magazine for the opportunity [*]to comment .

example.name: transitive
example.text: It 's understood that MGM\/UA recently contacted Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp. , which made two failed bids for the movie studio , to see if the company was still interested .
example.arg: Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp. , which made two failed bids for the movie studio ,
to see if the company was still interested

example.name: NP only, all arguments
example.text: our contacts with local police squads handling drug-relatedcrimes
example.arg: with local police squads handling drug-related crimes

example.name: Arg1 only
example.text: Litmus paper turns red on contact with an acid.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Their first contact with European settlers was in the 16th century.
